overview.description: Uttarakhand, located in northern India, is known for its Himalayan peaks, pilgrimage sites, and natural beauty. Established as a state on November 9, 2000, it features attractions like Rishikesh and Nainital.

top_destinations.name: Rishikesh
top_destinations.description: The yoga capital with Ganges River and Laxman Jhula.

top_destinations.name: Nainital
top_destinations.description: A hill station with Naini Lake and snow views.
top_destinations.best_time: March to June, October to February
top_destinations.travel_tips: Boat on Naini Lake; carry warm clothes.

top_destinations.name: Mussoorie
top_destinations.description: The Queen of Hills with scenic trails.
top_destinations.best_time: March to June, October to February
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit Gun Hill; enjoy cable car ride.

culinary_delights.name: Little Buddha Café
culinary_delights.description: Famous for Tibetan and Indian food.

culinary_delights.name: Café Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

culinary_delights.name: The Green Hotel
culinary_delights.description: Popular for local and continental fusion.

must_visit_spots.name: Jim Corbett National Park
must_visit_spots.description: A wildlife sanctuary with tiger safaris.
must_visit_spots.tip: Book a jeep safari in advance.

must_visit_spots.name: Kedarnath Temple
must_visit_spots.description: A sacred Hindu shrine in the Himalayas.
must_visit_spots.tip: Trek or take a pony ride.

must_visit_spots.name: Valley of Flowers
must_visit_spots.description: A UNESCO site with vibrant flora.

must_visit_spots.name: Har Ki Pauri
must_visit_spots.description: A famous ghat in Haridwar for Ganga Aarti.

must_visit_spots.name: Auli
must_visit_spots.description: A skiing destination with Himalayan views.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Dehradun is 250 km from Delhi (NH7, 6-7 hrs). By train: Dehradun Railway Station. By air: Jolly Grant Airport.
travel_essentials.best_time: March to June, October to February
travel_essentials.tips: Carry warm clothing; avoid monsoon treks.
